text:
Arrange the parts to form a coherent paragraph:
B. Stalls offered regional snacks and handicrafts.
D. The park was decorated with lights and banners.
C. Local musicians performed throughout the day.
A. The festival drew visitors from many cities.
explanation: Logical flow: A (overview) → B (stalls) → C (music) → D (decor).
